dn24:2.12.4_0: ahaṁ taṁ vācaṁ appahāya taṁ cittaṁ appahāya taṁ diṭṭhiṁ appaṭinissajjitvā samaṇassa gotamassa sammukhībhāvaṁ gaccheyyanti,
dn24:2.12.6_0: mayaṁ acelaṁ pāthikaputtaṁ varattāhi bandhitvā nāgehi āviñcheyyāmāti.
dn24:2.12.7_0: Abhabbo pana acelo pāthikaputto taṁ vācaṁ appahāya taṁ cittaṁ appahāya taṁ diṭṭhiṁ appaṭinissajjitvā mama sammukhībhāvaṁ āgantuṁ.
dn24:2.12.8_0: Sacepissa evamassa—ahaṁ taṁ vācaṁ appahāya taṁ cittaṁ appahāya taṁ diṭṭhiṁ appaṭinissajjitvā samaṇassa gotamassa sammukhībhāvaṁ gaccheyyanti,
dn24:2.13.1_1: taṁ parisaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesiṁ samādapesiṁ samuttejesiṁ sampahaṁsesiṁ,
dn24:2.13.1_2: taṁ parisaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā mahābandhanā mokkhaṁ
dn24:2.13.1_3: karitvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni mahāviduggā uddharitvā tejodhātuṁ samāpajjitvā sattatālaṁ vehāsaṁ abbhuggantvā
dn24:2.13.1_4: aññaṁ sattatālampi acciṁ abhinimminitvā pajjalitvā dhūmāyitvā mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ paccuṭṭhāsiṁ.
dn24:2.13.4_0: yatheva te ahaṁ acelaṁ pāthikaputtaṁ ārabbha byākāsiṁ, tatheva taṁ vipākaṁ aññathā vā’ti?
dn24:2.13.7_0: yadi evaṁ sante kataṁ vā hoti uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ, akataṁ vā’ti?
dn24:2.13.8_0: ‘Addhā kho, bhante, evaṁ sante kataṁ hoti uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ, no akatan’ti.
dn24:2.13.9_0: ‘Evampi kho maṁ tvaṁ, moghapurisa, uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karontaṁ evaṁ vadesi—
dn24:2.13.10_0: na hi pana me, bhante, bhagavā uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karotīti.
dn24:2.13.11_0: Passa, moghapurisa, yāvañca te idaṁ aparaddhan’ti.
dn24:2.13.12_1: sunakkhatto licchaviputto mayā vuccamāno apakkameva imasmā dhammavinayā,
dn24:2.14.2_3: aparāmasato ca me paccattaññeva nibbuti viditā,
dn24:2.14.3_0: Santi, bhaggava, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā issarakuttaṁ brahmakuttaṁ ācariyakaṁ aggaññaṁ paññapenti.
dn24:2.14.5_0: ‘saccaṁ kira tumhe āyasmanto issarakuttaṁ brahmakuttaṁ ācariyakaṁ aggaññaṁ paññapethā’ti?
dn24:2.14.6_0: Te ca me evaṁ puṭṭhā, ‘āmo’ti paṭijānanti.
dn24:2.14.8_0: ‘kathaṁvihitakaṁ pana tumhe āyasmanto issarakuttaṁ brahmakuttaṁ ācariyakaṁ aggaññaṁ paññapethā’ti?
dn24:2.14.9_0: Te mayā puṭṭhā na sampāyanti, asampāyantā mamaññeva paṭipucchanti.
dn24:2.14.11_0: ‘Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko saṁvaṭṭati.
dn24:2.14.12_0: Saṁvaṭṭamāne loke yebhuyyena sattā ābhassarasaṁvattanikā honti.
dn24:2.14.13_0: Te tattha honti manomayā pītibhakkhā sayaṁpabhā antalikkhacarā subhaṭṭhāyino ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ tiṭṭhanti.
dn24:2.15.1_0: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko vivaṭṭati.
dn24:2.15.3_0: Atha kho aññataro satto āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā ābhassarakāyā cavitvā suññaṁ brahmavimānaṁ upapajjati.
dn24:2.15.4_0: So tattha hoti manomayo pītibhakkho sayampabho antalikkhacaro subhaṭṭhāyī,
dn24:2.16.1_0: Tassa tattha ekakassa dīgharattaṁ nivusitattā anabhirati paritassanā uppajjati—
dn24:2.16.2_0: aho vata aññepi sattā itthattaṁ āgaccheyyunti.
dn24:2.16.3_0: Atha aññepi sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā ābhassarakāyā cavitvā suññaṁ brahmavimānaṁ upapajjanti tassa sattassa sahabyataṁ.
dn24:2.16.4_0: Tepi tattha honti manomayā pītibhakkhā sayaṁpabhā antalikkhacarā subhaṭṭhāyino,
dn24:2.17.1_0: Tatrāvuso, yo so satto paṭhamaṁ upapanno, tassa evaṁ hoti—
dn24:2.17.2_0: ahamasmi brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānaṁ,
dn24:2.17.5_0: aho vata aññepi sattā itthattaṁ āgaccheyyunti;
dn24:2.17.6_0: iti mama ca manopaṇidhi. Ime ca sattā itthattaṁ āgatāti.
dn24:2.17.7_0: Yepi te sattā pacchā upapannā, tesampi evaṁ hoti—
dn24:2.17.8_0: ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānaṁ;
dn24:2.17.11_0: Imañhi mayaṁ addasāma idha paṭhamaṁ upapannaṁ; mayaṁ panāmha pacchā upapannāti.
dn24:2.17.12_2: so dīghāyukataro ca hoti vaṇṇavantataro ca mahesakkhataro ca.
dn24:2.17.13_0: Ye pana te sattā pacchā upapannā, te appāyukatarā ca honti dubbaṇṇatarā ca appesakkhatarā ca.
dn24:2.17.14_0: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, āvuso, vijjati, yaṁ aññataro satto tamhā kāyā cavitvā itthattaṁ āgacchati.
dn24:2.17.15_0: Itthattaṁ āgato samāno agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
dn24:2.17.16_0: Agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito samāno ātappamanvāya padhānamanvāya anuyogamanvāya appamādamanvāya sammāmanasikāramanvāya
dn24:2.17.18_0: “yo kho so bhavaṁ brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānaṁ,
dn24:2.17.18_2: So nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
